channel.title: Music – Nana Mouskouri
channel.description: Recent content in Nana Mouskouri on Music

item.title: Nana Mouskouri - Only Love
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Vladimir Cosma, Norman Gimbel
KY: 62066 / KY: 20016

Only love can
make a memory
Only love can make a
moment last
You were
there
And all the
world was young
And all its
songs unsung
And I remember
you then
When love
was all
All you were
living for
Then how you gave
that love to me
Only then I felt my
heart was free
I was part
of you
And you were
all of me
Warm were
the days and
The nights
of those years
Painted in colours to
outshine the sun
All of the
words and
The dreams
and the tears
Live in my
rememberance
Only love can
make a memory
Only love can make
that moment last
Life was new there was
a rage to live
Each day a page
to live
And I remember
you then
When love
was all
All you were
loving for
Then how you gave
that love to me
Only then I knew
my heart was free
I was part
of you
And you were
all of me

Only love can
make a memory
Only love can make
that moment last
Life was new there
was a rage to live
Each day a
page to live
And I remember
you then
When love
was all
All you were
loving for
Then how you gave
that love to me
Only then I knew my
heart was free
I was part of you
and you were all of me

item.title: Nana Mouskouri - Over And Over
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Chapman, Michael Jourdan, George Petsilas, Fennell, Traditional
KY: 8902 / KY: 7282

I never dared
to reach for the moon
I never thought I’d
know heaven so soon
I couldn’t hope
to say how I feel
The joy in my heart
no words can reveal
Over and over and
I whisper your name
Over and over
and I kiss you again
I see the light
of love in your eyes
Love is forever
no more goodbye-

Now just a memory
the tears
That I cried
now just a memory
The sighs
that I sighed
Dreams
that I cherished
All have
come true
All my tomorrows
I give to you
Over and over and
I whisper your name
Over and over
and I kiss you again
I see the light
of love in your eyes
Love is forever
no more goodbye-

Life’s summer leaves
may turn into gold
The love that we share
will never grow old
Here in your arms
no words far away
Here in your arms
forever I’ll stay
Over and over and
I whisper your name
Over and over
and I kiss you again
I see the light
of love in your eyes
Love is forever
no more goodbye
Over and over and
I whisper your name
Over and over
and I kiss you again
I see the light
of love in your eyes
Love is forever
no more goodbye
Lai la lai la
lai lai lai lai
Lai la lai la
lai lai lai lai
La la la
lai la la lai lai
La lai lai lai lai lai
lai lai lai lai
Lai la lai la
lai lai lai lai
Lai la lai la
lai lai lai lai
La la la
lai la la lai lai
La lai lai lai lai
lai lai lai lai lai-
